messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] yu gi ho gameboy help needed
messages.msgSnippet: Heidi, My son owns the yu gi ho (Yu Gi Ho Dark Dual Stories) game for gameboy color and it is in English.  He says he is not sure about the game boy advanced
messages.messageBody:
Heidi,

My son owns the yu gi ho (Yu Gi Ho Dark Dual Stories) game for gameboy color
and it is in English. He says he is not sure about the game boy advanced
version, but thinks he might be able to tell you after Christmas, lol.

blessings,
erin
----- Original Message -----
From: <hmsclmyboy@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 29, 2002 1:38 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] yu gi ho gameboy help needed


> Sorry hit the wrong button
>
> I heard that the yu gi ho games for the game boy are in Japanese and
> subtitled in English, is this true?
>
> Heidi
